name: Drugz - 2D Drug Empire Simulator
description:
An immersive and thrilling strategy game that puts you in control of your own criminal empire.
Start by trafficking drugs between cities, carefully managing your budget to bring in a profit.
As your empire grows, expand your business by investing in new facilities, warehouses and luxury items.
But be careful - the authorities and rivals aren't too keen on your activities.
Fight or flee as police operations approach and use wit to outsmart other gangs.
Create your own legend and become the most feared drug lord in the region.
Step into the dark underworld of Drugz.
